message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Alice,  $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in your product, but I can only go up to $90.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Let's see if we can shake on a deal at this price.
Alice, I'm really trying to get the best deal possible, and $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $92.  What do you say?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $94, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Let's see if we can finalize a deal at this price.
